ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to Anne Buvé (Instituut voor Tropische Geneeskunde, Antwerpen, Belgium), Tamara Giles-Vernick (Institut Pasteur, Paris), Nancy Rose Hunt (University of Michigan), Charles Becker (Centre National de Recherche Scientifique, France), Teresa Avelar, and Uwe Schulte-Varendorff (Universität Osnabrück, Osnabrück, Germany) for enlightening discussions. We thank Pierre Dandoy and Rafael Storme (Afrika Archief, Federale Overheidsdients—Buitenlandse Zaken, Buitenlandse Handel en Ontwikkelingssamenwerking (FO-BZBHO), Brussels), Evelyne Camara (Archives Nationales d’Outre-Mer (ANOM), Aix-en-Provence, France), and Aline Pueyo (Institut de Médecine Tropicale du Service de Santé des Armées (IMTSSA), Marseille, France), for their attention and help to our research in their respective Archives. V.M. acknowledges support from the Hungarian Scientific Research Fund (OTKA NF72791) and a Bolyai János Research Fellowship of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences. C.A. acknowledges support from the Directorate-General for Development Cooperation of the Belgian Government through the Flemish Interuniversity Council (VLIR-UOS Own Initiative ZEIN2010PR376).
